snippet: Baltimore slugger Nelson Cruz was named to Major League Baseball’s All-Star Game on Sunday, one season after serving a 50-game suspension in conjunction with baseball's performance-enhancing drugs scandal....

headline.print_headline: Orioles' Cruz and Yankees' Jeter Make All-Star Rosters
headline.main: Orioles' Cruz and Yankees' Jeter Make All-Star Rosters

lead_paragraph: Baltimore slugger Nelson Cruz was named to Major League Baseball’s All-Star Game on Sunday, one season after serving a 50-game suspension in conjunction with baseball's performance-enhancing drugs scandal.
